parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Animations

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Switch between elapsed game time and audio time being used as animation timer. Used for audio/animation synchronization.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> soldier '''useAudioTimeForMoves''' toggle

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> soldier: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> toggle: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>player useAudioTimeForMoves true</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setAccTime]], [[accTime]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on January 30, 2019 - 16:15 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:.kju|.kju]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Makes movement (simulation) speed independent off [[accTime]].

So you can move "normal fast" in slow motion, and move "normal slow" in fast time.
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
